query: SELECT re.id, re.year, re.title, re.status, COUNT(rr.id) as results_count FROM raceEditions re LEFT JOIN raceResults rr ON re.id = rr.editionId GROUP BY re.id, re.year, re.title, re.status ORDER BY re.year DESC
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 5otSXyj2JhDnPBE.root --database EfYbWeVURSuSsCZqghqxkY --execute SELECT re.id, re.year, re.title, re.status, COUNT(rr.id) as results_count FROM raceEditions re LEFT JOIN raceResults rr ON re.id = rr.editionId GROUP BY re.id, re.year, re.title, re.status ORDER BY re.year DESC
